channel.title: Compiler error help!
channel.description: [code]client.java:1641: illegal start of type else ^ client.java:1642: ']' expected if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && Dlong) ^ client.java:1642: ';' expected if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && Dlong) ^ client.java:1642: <identifier> expected if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && Dlong) ^ client.java:1643: invalid method declaration;
